content:
# I successfully harvested 10 units of Coal, and my inventory now contains coal, stone, iron ore, and iron plates.

# Now that I have Coal, I can return to the Stone Furnace and insert the Coal to resume smelting the remaining Copper Ore.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=5)  # Inserting 5 units of Coal into the furnace.

# After refueling, I will check the status of the Stone Furnace and my inventory again to confirm everything is in order.
print(f"Inventory after refueling: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Output current inventory.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)  # Inspect the furnace inventory after refueling.
print(f"Stone Furnace Inventory: {furnace_inventory}")  # Display the contents of the Stone Furnace after insertion.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Checking the state of entities after the action.
